column1: This is a table of all terms being supported in Slime Reader.
column2: The terms get automatically formatted into a .json file for Slime Reader by a Python script, therefore a bit of syntax is important. Adding new terms is very easy, all that matters, is that the deafult name we are using starts with a # Then the following cell will contain the official term, after that, you can add an arbitrary amount of alternative terms, ended by an empty cell. If there is no official term, or it is identical, simply leave the box empty. Having cells without any alternatives given is not a problem, they will automatically be omitted. The % can also be used to mark the default term, in which case a capitalized version will be added automatically as well.
